function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of synchronization between objective and subjective data in IEQ studies","Impact":"Inability to study the correlation between IEQ parameters and occupant satisfaction in real-life scenarios","Mitigation":"Develop tools for simultaneous data collection of objective IEQ data and occupant opinions","Technologies":"Sensors, data collection and analysis software","People":"Occupants, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology developers"},{"Description":"Inability to achieve simultaneous data collection of objective IEQ data and occupant opinions","Impact":"Limitations in understanding indoor environmental data and occupants' experiences","Mitigation":"Develop an IEQ monitoring device with multiple sensors and intelligent IEQ system software","Technologies":"Sensor technology, cloud database, platform development","People":"Occupants, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology developers"},{"Description":"Continuous improvement and upgrading of the Intelligent Built Environment Monitor (IBEM) since 2014","Impact":"Risks associated with evolving technology, potential for malfunctions or errors","Mitigation":"Continued monitoring, testing, and updating of the IBEM architecture","Technologies":"Upgraded hardware and software components","People":"Research and development team, end-users","Owner":"Research institutions, technology developers"}]}
